name: mubble
description: Open-source voice-to-text desktop app with AI-powered editing
author: Mubble Contributors

scripts.build:skip-native: node scripts/skip-native-build.js && cd apps/desktop && pnpm run build
scripts.dist:win: pnpm run build:skip-native && cd apps/desktop && pnpm run dist:win:copy
scripts.dist:mac: pnpm run build:skip-native && cd apps/desktop && pnpm run dist:mac:copy
